title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the requirements for the serverless computing platform, including features, performance, scalability, security, integration with existing systems, and deployment strategies. Define the architecture, technology stack, and development processes.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the serverless compute engine, resource management, auto-scaling, and integration with other components.

title: Implement Serverless Compute Engine
description: Develop the core serverless compute engine that manages and executes user code in a scalable and efficient manner.

title: Develop Resource Management and Auto-scaling
description: Implement the resource management and auto-scaling components that dynamically allocate and deallocate resources based on workload.

title: Implement Security and Access Control
description: Design and implement security measures, including authentication, authorization, and secure communication channels.

title: Design and Develop User Interface
description: Create a user-friendly interface for developers to manage and interact with the serverless computing platform.

title: Implement Monitoring and Logging
description: Develop monitoring and logging components to track system performance, resource usage, and user activity.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the serverless computing platform.

title: Conduct System Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Perform comprehensive testing, including unit tests, integration tests, performance tests, and security audits, to ensure the platform meets all requirements.

title: Document and Publish Developer Resources
description: Create comprehensive documentation, tutorials, and developer resources to help users understand and leverage the serverless computing platform.
